name: RawColorPreview6

infos.name: Farbvarianten- und Mustervorschau im Listing
infos.description:
Mit diesem Plugin ist es Ihnen möglich alle vorhandenen Farbvarianten eines Artikels bereits in der Kategorieübersicht und Einkaufswelten zu zeigen, sowie bei der Suche nach Artikeln. Alle Farben sind frei konfigurierbar und auf Ihre Farboption anwendbar. Sie können ebenfalls Bilder verwenden um spezielle Muster oder mehrfarbige Bilder anzuzeigen.

Beim Mouseover über die Farbe wechselt das Artikelbild in der Vorschau. Außerdem wird bereits durch den Klick auf die Farbvariante, der entsprechende Artikel in der Detailansicht ausgewählt.

Dieses Plugin ist eine enorme Vereinfachung für ihre Kunden und spart unnötige Ladezeiten! Außerdem ist es ein echter Hingucker!

Plugin Features

  • Artikelbild bereits bei Mouseover sichtbar
  • Komplett anpassbar mit Less / CSS
  • Tolle Übersicht im Artikel - Listing und der Suche
  • Verwenden Sie Farbcodes oder Musterbilder als Varianten Vorschau
infos.installationManual: Einfach Varianten mit der Eigenschaft Farbe / Color erstellen. Innerhalb der Eigenschaft Color haben Sie die Möglichkeit ein Bild oder HexCode zu hinterlegen. Sobald ein Bild oder HexCode vorhanden ist werden diese Farbvarianten bereits im Listing dargestellt.
infos.shortDescription: Farben und Muster in der Artikelübersicht auf den ersten Blick! Erleichtern Sie ihrem Kunden das Leben. Sie können den Style bequem ihrem Shop individuell anpassen
infos.highlights:
Artikelbild bei Mouseover
Style ihrem Shop anpassbar
Farbcodes super einfach pflegen
Musterbilder verwenden
Im Listing sowie bei Suche sichtbar

infos.name: Color variants or pattern preview in listing
infos.description:
With this plugin you are able to show your customers all available color variants already on the listing and on the search for articles. All colors are completely configureable and useable on your color options. Of course you could also upload a picture with a pattern or multi color if your shops offer more complex color variants.


On mouseover over the color variants the right article picture will be shown and your customer don't have to visit the detail page in first place.  A simple click on the color is enough to call the detail page with the right variant article. 


This plugin is a huge simplification for your customers and saves unnecessary loading times! It is also a real eye-catcher!


  • Article picture visible on mouseover
  • Completely customizable with Less / CSS
  • Awesome overview of color variants on the listing and search

  • Use color codes or pictures to show your patterns or color variants
infos.installationManual: Easy installation just create your variants with a color and configure the color property afterwards. You have the possibility to use a hexcode for the color or upload an image for a pattern or multi colors.
infos.shortDescription: Make sure to show your customers all available color variants already on the article listing page. Article pictures will be shown on mouseover. Style is completely customizable!
infos.highlights:
Article picture on mouseover
Style customizable
Color codes easy configuration
Use pattern pictures
Visibile on store listing and on article search

changelog.text: There was a config added which makes it possible to define when the colors should be shown at minium
- Fixed a bug where colors weren't shown if the parent is shown in listing instead of a variant
There was an issue with extending two template files which weren't need this resulted in displaying the colors two times.

- Fixed a bug which occurs on pagination

- Refactored the config usage in template
- There is a new design configuration to show color buttons round or square
- Added sorting for color boxes based on the configuration in backend
- Wrong default value for plugin config
Only show "+ colors" if there more than configured
Title had a line break which could be unwanted replaced with div.
There was a bug in the calculation of the amount of available colors.
Text should show how many more colors are available
It is now possible to limit the shown colors in the plugin config
- Snippets were named wrong for Shopware 6.4
- Changed version and css behavior for 6.4
- Missed to upload new dist file for javascript
- Only set the src and srcset if there is actually a value
- Only show colors if the colors are actually configured
- Fixed a bug which didn't showed the variants if there are mutliple variants and one were out of stock
- Fixed a bug which shortens the text on detail page
- Fixed a bug on detail page which caused an empty square

# 1.1.1
- Added config to make it possible to show out of stock variants
- Added color variants to product suggestions

# 1.1.0
- Shows the color names next to color icons if configured
- Shows color icons on the detail page if variant is setup to text
- Color icons are now shown correctly if only media is configured
The product search shows the colors twice
Colors for variants which are out of stock no longer shown in listing
- Same color was shown multiple times if a variant had more than one property for example color and size
Initial concept for Shopware 6
